column2: "Nda no mu no na Hezekia yaar owuyar. Na Amoz ne ba nkɔnhyɛnyi Isaia baa ne nkyɛn
column5: Siesie wo fie yie; na ibowu

column2: "Nna Hezekia daan n'enyim kɔr ban ho
column8: afei kaa mbrɛ mesi na manantsew w'enyim wɔ nokwar na akoma a odzi mu mu
column9: na mayɛ dza oye wɔ w'enyi do. Na Hezekia suu yayaayaw."

column7: Mbrɛ EWURADZE w'egya David ne Nyankopɔn no se nye yi
column10: medze mfe duenum mubogu wo nda do."

column2: "Na mebɛgye ɔwo na kurow yi mefi Asiriahen nsamu: na mobɔbɔ kurow yi ho ban."
"Na iyi nyɛ asɛnkyerɛdze a ofi EWURADZE hɔ mma wo
column3: dɛ EWURADZE bɛyɛ adze a ɔaka yi:"
mebɛma ntwerba no do sunsuma a ewia ama esian wɔ Ahaz n'ewiadɔn do no
column4: ɔasan ekyir ntwerba du. Nna ewia saan ekyir ntwerba du wɔ ewiadɔn a oesian dada no do."

column2: "Judahen Hezekia ne nsɛm a ɔyaree na ɔbɔɔ esu fii ne yarba no mu no ɔkyerɛwee nye yi."

column3: Me nda no wigyinae mu no
column4: mebɛkɛhɛn samanadze aponkɛse no mu: Wɔagye me mfe nkaa wɔ me nsamu."
wɔ atseasefo asaase do; Murunnhu nyimpa bio wɔ wiadze mu atsefo no mu."

column3: na woeyi no me nkyɛn kɔ dɛ oguanhwɛfo ntamadan: Mabobɔw mo nkwa dɛ ɔtanwemfo; nkyɛ orubotwa me efi nsadua mu akyen: Da kor adzesaa na ibowie me."

column2: "Musui frɛɛ mboa kodur anapa; dɛ ogyata
column3: obubu me mbiew nyinara mu: Da kor adzesaa na ibowie me."

column2: "Mokrɔɔw dɛ akyemfowa anaa dɛ nantwinoma; Midzii nkɔmbɔ dɛ ebubur: mohwɛɛ sor ma m'enyi bui; Ao EWURADZE
"Menka dɛn o? Ɔnoara na ɔaka akyerɛ me
column3: na ɔnoara so na ɔayɛ. Mebɛnantsew berɛberɛ me mfe nyinara wɔ me kra n'ahoguan mu."
ndzɛmba yinom do na adasa nam tsena ase
column4: Na no mu koraa na mo sunsum no nkwa wɔ: Dɛm ntsi bɔ me esu

column3: m'asomdwee ntsi na minyaa ahoguan kɛse: Na ɔwo na me kra ho dɔ ntsi eyi no efi mprɔwee amona no mu; Osiandɛ ɔwo atow mo bɔn nyina egu w'ekyir."
owu runntum nntonton wo: Hɔn a wosian kɔ adakamona mu no runntum nnhwɛ wo nokwar no kwan."

column5: dɛ mbrɛ mereyɛ ndɛ da yi: Egya da no nokwar no edzi kyerɛ mba."

column2: "EWURADZE ayɛ krado dɛ ɔbɛgye me nkwa: Dɛm ntsi yɛbɔtow mo ndwom wɔ nsankutsen ano Hɛn nkwa nda nyinara wɔ EWURADZE fie."

column4: na wɔmbɔ no boa ntar pɔmpɔ no do

column3: Asɛnkyerɛdze dɛ mobɔkɔ EWURADZE fie nye bɛn?"
